aleph
Class Host

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--aleph.Host
public class Host
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

A Host is a machine running the Aleph Server. Multiple PEs coexist on a host.

See Also:
aleph.CommunicationManager, java.io.serializable, Serialized Form
